content:
I am currently installing lean from nixpkgs master, but that is annoying for contribution to mathlib in the time window when mathlib has upgraded to a new version, but nixpkgs hasn’t caught up yet.
How do other nix users solve this?
Ideally, maybe, I’d expect a shell.nix in the mathlib project that pulls the version matching leanpkg.toml, but maybe there are good reasons for not having that?
